49  void Arma2Psd::operator()(ARMAView& arma, SeqViewDouble& Psd) {
50 
51  Dvector ar(arma.GetArOrder() + 1);
52  Dvector ma(arma.GetMaOrder() + 1);
53  Dvector psd(Psd.GetSize());
54 
55 
56  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ar.size(); i++) {
57  ar(i) = arma.GetAR(i);
58  }
59  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ma.size(); i++) {
60  ma(i) = arma.GetMA(i);
61  }
62  execute(
63  ar,
64  ma,
65  psd
66  );
67  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Psd.GetSize(); i++) {
68  Psd(0, i) = sqrt(1.0 / (4.0 * (Psd.GetSize() - 1)*(Psd.GetSize() - 1))) * psd(i);
69  }
70 
71 
72  }
73 
74 
75 
77 
78  void Arma2Psd::execute(Dvector& AR, Dvector& MA, Dvector& psd) {
79 
80  double re, im, spec;
81  double cosarg, sinarg;
82  double cosCurrent, sinCurrent;
83  double cosNext;
84 
85  /* initialize fixed values */
86 
87  double arg = 0.0;
88  double darg = M_PI / (psd.size() - 1);
89  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < psd.size(); j++) {
90 
91  cosarg = cos(arg);
92  sinarg = sin(arg);
93 
94  /* denominator (AR part) */
95  re = 1.0;
96  im = 0.0;
97  cosCurrent = 1.0;
98  sinCurrent = 0.0;
99  for (unsigned int r = 1; r < AR.size(); r++) {
100  /* recurrence form (much faster) */
101  cosNext = cosCurrent * cosarg - sinCurrent * sinarg;
102  sinCurrent = cosCurrent * sinarg + sinCurrent * cosarg;
103  cosCurrent = cosNext;
104  re += AR(r) * cosCurrent;
105  im += AR(r) * sinCurrent;
106  }
107 
108  /* one-sided spectral density */
109  spec = 2.0 * AR(0) * AR(0) / (re * re + im * im);
110 
111  /* numerator (MA part) */
112  re = MA(0);
113  im = 0.0;
114  cosCurrent = 1.0;
115  sinCurrent = 0.0;
116  for (unsigned int r = 1; r < MA.size(); r++) {
117  /* recurrence form (much faster) */
118  cosNext = cosCurrent * cosarg - sinCurrent * sinarg;
119  sinCurrent = cosCurrent * sinarg + sinCurrent * cosarg;
120  cosCurrent = cosNext;
121  re += MA(r) * cosCurrent;
122  im += MA(r) * sinCurrent;
123  }
124  psd(j) = spec * (re * re + im * im);
125 
126  arg += darg;
127  }
128 
129  }
130 }
